#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

List of issues.


= SVG =

XML to SVG through a simple, single stylesheet is not easy because of the limitation of "pure" stylesheets.
Stylesheets operator do not include Math operators.

== Projection ==

The golfml2svg.xsl stylesheet does not perform a projection from the lat/log sphere to a surface.

== Altitude ==

How to graphically transpose altitude? Shades of green? Control transparency? Add a mask?
